definition: wax gourd (Cucurbitaceae, Benincasa hispida)/white gourd/white hairy melon/Chinese squash

sentences.english: She's cute, but she is a shrimp.
sentences.chinese: 她很可愛，不過是個矮冬瓜。

sentences.english: Two other types of melons include winter melon and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 另外兩種瓜類還有冬瓜和黃瓜。

sentences.english: There were still vendors on the dork to sell face-washing water and white gourd soup.
sentences.chinese: 碼頭上依然有人在賣洗臉水和冬瓜湯。

sentences.english: M oil was not only low of acid value, light of colour and lustre, but also the high rate of refining.
sentences.chinese: 所得水冬瓜油不僅酸價低，色澤淺，而且精煉率高。

sentences.english: Eat more wax gourd can eliminate dropsy phenomenon, thin legs and arms and legs.
sentences.chinese: 多喫冬瓜可以消除浮腫現象，瘦腿部及四肢。

sentences.english: Available when eating melon soup, or fried, taste, try some light.
sentences.chinese: 食用時可用冬瓜煲湯或清炒，滋味儘量淡一些。

sentences.english: A large bowl of white gourd soup also cost five Fen.
sentences.chinese: 大的藍邊碗裏一碗冬瓜湯，也是五分錢。

sentences.english: Peel white gourd off then cut it into thick slices(about half a centimeter).
sentences.chinese: 冬瓜去皮切約半釐米厚片。

sentences.english: Then on the plate with wax gourd .
Day, a thin wax gourd was abandoned in a small river.
sentences.chinese: 一日，一個瘦小的冬瓜被遺棄在了小河邊。

sentences.english: The purposes of the study are to promote a new approach of utilizing white gourd peel.
sentences.chinese: 目的在於爲冬瓜皮的利用提供一條新的途徑。

definition: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
